params.name: c
params.value: 文件有类型，描述和标签

resources.name: 管理员修改文件描述等

body.text:
{
	"c": "说明：name和邮箱是唯一的，必填，密码需要重复两次如下",
	"name": "hunterhug1",
	"nick_name": "小可爱",
	"password": "12345678",
	"repassword": "12345678",
	"email": "459527502@qq.com"
}

{
	"c": "说明：修改密码，需要邮箱中的码，重复两次新密码，如下",
	"email": "569929309dd@qq.com",
	"password": "12345678",
	"repassword": "12345678",
	"code": "5f31e2"
}

{
	"c": "说明：类型1：type=1，链接必须符合https://www.amazon.com/Best-Sellers开头，open表示打开采集,会有定时器去拿,catch_detail表示抓取商品详情,page表示抓取页数，可选范围1-5，排序字段为order_num，标签tag用来筛选，remark为备注",
	"name": "i love aws",
	"link": "https://www.amazon.com/Best-Sellers/zgbs/wireless",
	"type": 1,
	"open": 1,
	"catch_detail": 1,
	"page_num": 5,
	"order_num": 0,
	"tag": "tag1",
	"remark": "happy aws"
}

{
		"c": "说明：类型2：type=2，链接必须符合https://www.amazon.com/s?me=A38PDDQNY9S8ES开头，open表示打开采集,catch_detail表示抓取商品详情,page可默认填1，后台不区分此字段，排序字段为order_num，标签tag用来筛选，remark为备注",
	"name": "i love aws",
	"link": "https://www.amazon.com/s?me=A38PDDQNY9S8ES",
	"type": 2,
	"open": 1,
	"catch_detail": 1,
	"page_num": 5,
	"order_num": 0,
	"tag": "tag1",
	"remark": "happy aws"
}

{
	"c": "说明：id为任务标志，可以修改任务的信息，如是否抓取open，抓取详情catch_detail，可以修改status=1表示送到垃圾箱",
	"id": 1,
	"name": "i love assws",
	"open": 1,
	"catch_detail": 1,
	"page_num": 5,
	"order_num": 0,
	"tag": "tag1",
	"remark": "happy ssaws",
	"status": 0
}

{
	"c": "说明：当id非空时查找该任务，否则根据筛选条件筛选，open=-1时查找所有，0查找不采集的，1查找采集的，同理catch_detail和type，状态status必须为0或1,0表示正常任务，1表示在垃圾箱中的任务，标签tag可以用来筛选符合该标签的，留空不筛选，可直接输入link类目链接来查找任务，同时可以根据任务创建时间create_time，更新时间update_time，最近抓取时间last_catch_time进行筛选，排序字段sort如下，+表示递增，-递减",
	"id": 0,
	"open": -1,
	"catch_detail": -1,
	"page_num": 5,
	"tag": "",
	"type": -1,
	"status": 0,
	"link": "",
	"create_time_begin": 0,
	"create_time_end": 0,
	"update_time_begin": 0,
	"update_time_end": 0,
	"last_catch_time_begin": 0,
	"last_catch_time_end": 0,
	"limit": 10,
	"page": 1,
	"sort": [
		"-order_num",
		"-last_catch_time",
		"-create_time",
		"-tag",
		"-update_time"
	]
}

{
	"c": "说明：open表示打开采集,排序字段为order_num，标签tag用来筛选，remark为备注，Asin为商品ASIN,name为任务名称，asin可以组成链接：https://www.amazon.com/dp/B078XZX9MD",
	"name": "i love aws",
	"asin": "B075JKRBL2",
	"open": 1,
	"order_num": 0,
	"tag": "tag1",
	"remark": "happy aws"
}

{
	"c": "说明：修改任务信息，open表示打开采集,排序字段为order_num，标签tag用来筛选，remark为备注，name为任务名称，status=1表示到垃圾箱",
	"id": 1,
	"name": "i love assws",
	"open": 1,
	"order_num": 0,
	"tag": "tag1",
	"remark": "happy ssaws",
	"status": 0
}

{
		"c": "说明：标签tag用来筛选，返回的数据中times表示出现次数，todo和doing,done非空表示在采集队列中的时间",
	"id": 0,
	"tag": "",
	"asin": "",
	"create_time_begin": 0,
	"create_time_end": 0,
	"update_time_begin": 0,
	"update_time_end": 0,
	"times_begin": 0,
	"times_end": 0,
	"limit": 10,
	"page": 1,
	"sort": [
		"-times",
		"-update_time",
		"-create_time",
		"-tag"
	]
}

resources.name: 更新ASIN库商品备注，标志等

body.text:
{
	"c": "说明：筛选，条件较多,tag还是标签，remark备注，statuas垃圾箱状态，asin和id用来精确查找，is_detail表明是不是抓取的详情，category_task_id为关联的类目任务id，category_task_type关联的任务类型，reviews表示评论人数，small_rank表示小类排名，当有类目关联才有，big_rank表示大类排名，只有抓取详情才有，price是价格浮点数，score是打分，浮点数，is_fbs是不是亚马逊配送，is_aws_sold是不是亚马逊自营，非自营且sold_by非空，表示卖家名字，sold_by_id卖家编号,asin可以组成链接：https://www.amazon.com/dp/B078XZX9MD",
	"id": 0,
	"tag": "",
	"asin": "B0793MSXSG",
	"status": 0,
	"create_time_begin": 0,
	"create_time_end": 0,
	"update_time_begin": 0,
	"update_time_end": 0,
	"category_task_id": 0,
	"category_task_type": -1,
	"is_detail": 1,
	"reviews_begin": 0,
	"reviews_end": 0,
	"big_rank_begin": 0,
	"big_rank_end": 0,
	"small_rank_begin": 0,
	"small_rank_end": 0,
	"price_begin": 0,
	"price_end": 0,
	"score_begin": 0,
	"score_end": 0,
	"is_fba": -1,
	"is_aws_sold": -1,
	"is_prime": -1,
	"sold_by": "",
	"sold_by_id": "",
	"limit": 10,
	"page": 1,
	"sort": [
		"-create_time",
		"=big_rank",
		"=small_rank",
		"=price",
		"=score",
		"=star",
		"-update_time",
		"-tag"
	]
}

resources.name: 列出已采集的ASIN详细信息

body.text:
{
	"c": "说明：可以添加备注和标签tag，用来备忘和筛选，可以status=1送到垃圾箱",
	"id": 1,
	"tag": "tag1",
	"remark": "happy ssaws",
	"status": 0
}

resources.name: 更新ASIN详细信息备注，标志等

body.text:
{
	"c": "说明：today为日期字符串，type=1表示Ip统计信息，2表示类目统计，3表示ASIN统计，每天采集会定时更新统计嘻嘻，表示今天用了多少个IP，采集了多少类目和多少ASIN，留空不筛选",
	"id": 0,
	"today": "",
	"type": -1,
	"create_time_begin": 0,
	"create_time_end": 0,
	"update_time_begin": 0,
	"update_time_end": 0,
	"limit": 10,
	"page": 1,
	"sort": [
		"-create_time",
		"-update_time",
		"-today"
	]
}

resources.name: 类目任务实时采集开始（8min内）
